description: Dumb, dumber....slave "One man's pleasure is another man's pain" this adage fits perfectly when the world's dumbest slaves meet the most sadistic ladies. Contessa Barbara Calucci and Baronessa Carmen Rivera are extremely hard and merciless. There's no escaping from the long arm of the law, which these dumb assholes get to experience first hand! There's deep diving into the anal examinations in the jail shower cell: the upper extremities of the torment experts drill their victims guts up to the stop. [Note: The spoken language in this film is German]
title: Dumm, Duemmer.. Sklave: Folter Werkzeug
